title: Ramsays.Kitchen.Nightmares.S04E05.WS.PDTV.XviD-REMAX
description:
In tonight&#039;s penultimate programme, Gordon returns to La Riviera - now renamed Abstract - a fine dining restaurant in Inverness. Owned by multi-millionaire Barry Larson and costing Ã‚Â£8,000 a week to run, the place boasted top French chef Loic LeFebvre and an impeccably-trained kitchen staff, all of them on a mission to bring sophisticated French cooking to the home of the haggis.

But the locals weren&#039;t biting and the restaurant was empty most nights. Gordon&#039;s recipe for survival forced them to tone down their act and demystify the menu to get the punters in. Today the restaurant&#039;s return to form has led to plans for expansion. Loic is still there, and now he&#039;s been promoted to executive chef he will oversee any new ventures. But can he continue to resist a return to French frills, and has he managed to pull off his own personal ambition, a Michelin star?
